byline.original: By MICHAEL M. GRYNBAUM and MARC SANTORA

lead_paragraph: Dr. Jonathan Zizmor’s advertisements promising remedies for all kinds of skin problems have been part of the city’s subway system since the early 1980s.

headline.print_headline: A Familiar Face in New York’s Subways Retires
headline.main: Dr. Zizmor, a Familiar Face in New York’s Subways, Has Retired

snippet: Dr. Jonathan Zizmor’s advertisements promising remedies for all kinds of skin problems have been part of the city’s subway system since the early 1980s.
abstract: Dr Jonathan Zizmor, dermatologist whose familiar face has graced New York City subway ads for over 25 years, has retired and closed his Manhattan-based practice; campy and ubiquitous subway billboards brought Zizmor to cult-like status and recognition across all five boroughs.
